title: i had bann and
body: I had bann on acc bisades that it dont give me keys and do you know how many time continiu this or is it forever?

replies.body:
If you had a suspension that limited your ability to earn hextech loot, you'll need to continue to play and show a consistent improvement in your in-game behavior before loot privileges are added back. Check out our [Loot Restriction FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions) for additional information.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Yo Targons Blade are you a Rioter? Because you really make things clear! Good Job!
